Package: io.vertx.ext.unit.report

[Java] Class ReportOptions

    • io.vertx.ext.unit.report.ReportOptions

    • Configures a reporter consisting in a name to, an address at and an optional format.

      Authors:
      Julien Viet

      • Field Summary

          Fields 
          Modifiers Name Description
          static String  DEFAULT_FORMAT The simple format is the default format value.
          static String  DEFAULT_TO The console is the default to value.
